books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil. The fledgling F.B.I. intervened, ineffectively.

books.description: An exploration of racism and antiracism in America.

books.author: Angeline Boulley
books.description: Daunis investigates a deadly new drug being distributed in her tribal community.
books.title: FIREKEEPER'S DAUGHTER

books.author: Jack Carr
books.description: The fourth book in the Terminal List series. James Reece is given a top-secret C.I.A. mission. Read by Ray Porter. 14 hours, 37 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE DEVIL'S HAND

books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West. Read by Julia Whelan. 15 hours, 2 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE FOUR WINDS

books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived. Read by Carey Mulligan. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: John Sandford
books.description: The 31st book in the Prey series. When federal officers are killed, Lucas Davenport and Virgil Flowers team up to investigate matters. Read by Richard Ferrone. 12 hours, 35 minutes unabridged.
books.title: OCEAN PREY

books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: Aloysius Archer, a World War II veteran, seeks to apprentice with Willie Dash, a private eye, in a corrupt California town. Read by Edoardo Ballerini and Brittany Pressley. 11 hours, 52 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A GAMBLING MAN

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.contributor: by Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?

books.author: John Boehner
books.description: The former speaker of the House reflects on his time in Washington, key political figures and the current state of the Republican Party. Read by the author. 7 hours, 46 minutes unabridged.
books.title: ON THE HOUSE

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: A look at the key players and outcomes of precision bombing during World War II. Read by the author. 5 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BOMBER MAFIA

books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: In the first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama offers personal reflections on his formative years and pivotal moments through his first term. Read by the author. 29 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PROMISED LAND

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.description: Stories within a story come to life as Li'l Petey, Flippy and Molly show baby frogs how to create comics.
books.title: CAT KID COMIC CLUB

books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.

books.description: After dealing with loss and setbacks, two sisters take risks on dreams and love.

books.description: The fifth book in the Sullivan's Crossing series.
